titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for an additional place of holding court in the Southern District of Ohio.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 6/27/2002--Introduced. Amends the Federal judicial code to provide for holding court for the Eastern Division of the Southern District of Ohio in St. Clairsville in addition to Columbus (current law).
